skillTree.localised_description: Even purported allies are little more than targets to be removed by the unhinged ambition of Styrkaar.

effects.description: Melee attack: +16 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons
Weapon strength: +16% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
As the Perfect Prince's dark influence increases, so too do the blessings of His pleasure.
One of the many styles of Slaaneshi Steed. They have long, sinuous bodies that writhe ceaselessly as they slither towards the foe.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

	➕  Immune to Psychology Attribute
	➕  Strider Attribute
	➕ Increased  Physical Resistance
	 ➕ Increased  Speed

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Styrkaar is so mesmerizing that few can find the will to raise a blade against him.

target_if: Leadership is lower than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: This small silver pendant is wrought to look like a serpent. Its eyes are set with amethysts. It was crafted from the crystallised soul of the first human to have been seduced by Slaanesh. When worn, it comes to life, burrowing deep into the owner's chest, inflicting hours of agony as it slowly scratches through skin, flesh and bone before nestling next to the champion's heart. Once there, it invigorates the bearer with sublime energy whenever he feels pain and instils a euphoric state that even the fear of death cannot man. Once a warrior has tasted this ecstasy, they will jealously guard the pendant, surrounding themselves only with loyal followers and shunning the company of rival champions lest they try and take it for themselves.

The Beguiling Gem is an intricately carved talisman. This large gemstone, seemingly an amethyst, sits in a gilt frame of platinum and sparkles in the light. Carved in its setting are images of Daemonic women seducing mortal men. When held in the hand, worn about the neck, or pinned to the wearer’s garb, this gemstone pulses with a pinkish hue. It’s believed the Beguiling Gem is not a gemstone at all, but rather it is the only tear Slaanesh ever shed, crystallised by the Dark God’s madness. Those who gaze upon it are transfixed by its otherworldly appearance.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Only those of surpreme grace and form are allowed to serve with Styrkaar.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: 10 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh and Chosen of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Styrkaar has an ethereal beauty that only Slaanesh may grant, but it comes at a cost to all those around him.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_description: Dechala's movement in combat is an epic poem told in movement, each blow slipped, each strike avoided a stanza of grace, seduction, and rapture, told to an enthralled crowd who play no more part than bystanders
"Come closer, sweet morsels… Why fight when you can simply surrender to temptation?"
For those branded by the Prince of Pleasure, even a military charge is an artful display of elegance and beauty.
Grace and speed are second nature to those bearing the Mark of Slaanesh.
Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Born in Norsca and blessed by Slaanesh, Styrkaar rose to the pinnacle of Lord of Pleasure's forces in record time, through means both fair and foul. Even as he serves Archaon, such ambition has not left Styrkaar's mind.

	(all characters)
